meanings.sent1: The makers of the toy worked hard to create it.
meanings.sent2: The makers in the workshop crafted beautiful pottery.
meanings.sent3: The makers of the cake accidentally added too much sugar.
meanings.sent4: The young artist was a true maker of colorful paintings.
meanings.sent5: The makers of the handmade jewelry showcased their talent at the fair.

meanings.definition: A person or company that produces goods.
meanings.sent1: Local makers supply fresh produce to the market.
meanings.sent2: The makers of the car ensured high-quality manufacturing.
meanings.sent3: The makers of the chocolate factory had a sweet job.
meanings.sent4: The small bakery was known as the maker of delicious pastries.
meanings.sent5: The makers of the clothing brand focused on sustainable materials.
